ROOT.sql:query: SELECT REGISTERED_ID, OWNER_UNIT_CODE, DOC_LIST_TYPE, FISCAL_YEAR, SERIAL_NUMBER, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),REGISTERED_DATE, 120) AS REGISTERED_DATE, REGISTRATION_COMMENT, REGISTRATOR_NAME, REGISTRATOR_CODE, SENT_BY_UNIT_NAME, SENT_BY_UNIT_CODE, RECEIVED_BY_UNIT_NAME, RECEIVED_BY_UNIT_CODE, DOCUMENT_NUMBER, DOCUMENT_SUBJECT, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_NAME, PERSON_IN_CHARGE_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),APPROVED_DATE, 120) AS APPROVED_DATE, INITIATOR_NAME, INITIATOR_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),EFFECTUATED_DATE, 120) AS EFFECTUATED_DATE, EFFECTUATION_METHOD, EFFECTUATION_COMMENT FROM WF_DOC_REG_LIST (NOLOCK) WHERE OWNER_UNIT_CODE = @OWNER_UNIT_CODE AND DOC_LIST_TYPE = @DOC_LIST_TYPE AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),REGISTERED_DATE, 120) LIKE @YEARMONTH+'%' ORDER BY SERIAL_NUMBER FOR XML AUTO
